show.description: Defines whether the video should be displayed or not.

index.description: Layer in which the video is displayed. (not supported yet)

title.description: Title of the video. Displayed in the playlist as the title.

video.description: Path to the FLV file. Can be a URL or local file.

image.description: This is just an alias for the attribute preview.

link.description: Displays a tiny image and allows linking to any target. (HTML link, Ajax etc.)

preview.description: Path to a preview image for playlist and main video display. Can be URL or local file.

flash.description: Path to the SWF file. Can be a URL or local file.
